entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
